text:
Alicia Silverstone and Breckin Meyer Are Anything But Clueless at Film’s Special Screening

As if she wasn’t going to show up?! A whopping 22 years after Clueless rocked the world with its bright colors, quotable dialogue and head-bopping soundtrack, Alicia Silverstone, who…
